TYPE3=0x01000001,0x00000200,0x57230000,0,0
TYPE4=0x00000101,0x00020000,0x57230000,1,0
;Allows RHW Crossing Under (Added 11/14/2009 By Blue Lightning)
;Modified 03/02/2013 Blue Lightning - Fixed orientation
